headline: Barclays Turns Cautious on American Tower (AMT) Amid EchoStar Risks
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is included among the 15 Blue Chip Dividend Stocks to Build a Passive Income Porfolio. On December 1, Barclays analyst Brendan Lynch trimmed the firm’s rating on American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) to Equal Weight and also lowered the price target to $200 from $203. The analyst highlighted that the tower companies […]

headline: American Tower (AMT): Reassessing Valuation After New 2032 Senior Notes and Reaffirmed Dividend
summary: American Tower (AMT) just paired a fresh 2032 senior notes issue with another reaffirmed quarterly dividend, a one two move that spotlights how management is balancing growth funding and ongoing shareholder cash returns. See our latest analysis for American Tower. Even with the fresh 2032 notes and steady dividend cadence, momentum has cooled. The 1 year total shareholder return of negative 10.68 percent reflects a broader reset in sentiment rather than company specific stress. If these moves...

headline: The Dividend Growth Trifecta: Hunting For Quality, Yield, And Growth
summary: Discover top portfolio picks prioritizing quality, yield, and growth amid high valuations. Click for undervalued income stocks that may be right for your portfolio.
